document.full_text: israel's state comptroller said on thursday he would investigate allegations of improper private funding of overseas trips benjamin netanyahu and his wife made before he became prime minister in 2009.
document.title: israeli watchdog to investigate netanyahu trips
lines_and_colors: israel's state comptroller said on thursday he would investigate allegations of improper private funding of overseas trips benjamin netanyahu and his wife made before he became prime minister in 2009.
